Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than $150. Considering your interest and potential benefit from this product, I propose a special introductory price of $120 for you. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and support for our brand. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the value for yourself! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
